mapper.select: SELECT ei.*,eh.enterprise_id,sum(eh.ehr_currentaccount) as ehr_currentaccount,count(eh.ehr_id) as hr_account FROM enterprise_info ei LEFT JOIN enterprise_hr eh on ei.e_id=eh.enterprise_id where e_id = #{e_id}

SELECT ei.e_id,ei.e_name,eh.enterprise_id,eh.ehr_position,u.name,ri.ehrid,ri.r_address,ri.r_salary,ri.r_education,ri.r_name,ri.r_tag,ri.r_id FROM enterprise_info ei LEFT JOIN enterprise_hr eh on ei.e_id=eh.enterprise_id LEFT JOIN recruitment_info ri on ri.ehrid=eh.ehr_id LEFT JOIN user u on u.id=eh.ehr_id where e_id = #{e_id} LIMIT 5

SELECT eh.enterprise_id,eh.ehr_position,ehr_currentaccount,u.name,ei.e_name FROM enterprise_hr eh LEFT JOIN user u on u.id=eh.ehr_id LEFT JOIN enterprise_info ei on ei.e_id=eh.enterprise_id where enterprise_id = #{e_id} ORDER BY ehr_currentaccount DESC LIMIT 3

SELECT ei.e_id,ei.e_name,ei.e_type,ei.e_operationstatus,ei.e_logo,ei.e_size,eh.enterprise_id,sum(eh.ehr_currentaccount) as ehr_currentaccount FROM enterprise_info ei LEFT JOIN enterprise_hr eh on ei.e_id=eh.enterprise_id GROUP BY ei.e_id ORDER BY RAND () LIMIT 6

SELECT ei.*,eh.enterprise_id,sum(eh.ehr_currentaccount) as ehr_currentaccount FROM enterprise_info ei LEFT JOIN enterprise_hr eh on ei.e_id=eh.enterprise_id GROUP BY ei.e_id ORDER BY ehr_currentaccount

SELECT ei.e_id,ei.e_name,ei.e_type,ei.e_address,ei.e_operationstatus,ei.e_logo,ei.e_size,eh.enterprise_id,sum(eh.ehr_currentaccount) as ehr_currentaccount FROM enterprise_info ei LEFT JOIN enterprise_hr eh on ei.e_id=eh.enterprise_id where e_address = #{e_address} GROUP BY ei.e_id ORDER BY ehr_currentaccount

SELECT ei.e_id,ei.e_name,ei.e_type,ei.e_address,ei.e_operationstatus,ei.e_logo,ei.e_size,eh.enterprise_id,sum(eh.ehr_currentaccount) as ehr_currentaccount FROM enterprise_info ei LEFT JOIN enterprise_hr eh on ei.e_id=eh.enterprise_id where e_type = #{e_type} GROUP BY ei.e_id ORDER BY ehr_currentaccount

SELECT ei.e_id,ei.e_name,ei.e_type,ei.e_address,ei.e_operationstatus,ei.e_logo,ei.e_size,eh.enterprise_id,sum(eh.ehr_currentaccount) as ehr_currentaccount FROM enterprise_info ei LEFT JOIN enterprise_hr eh on ei.e_id=eh.enterprise_id where e_size = #{e_size} GROUP BY ei.e_id ORDER BY ehr_currentaccount

SELECT ei.e_id,ei.e_name,ei.e_type,ei.e_operationstatus,ei.e_address,ei.e_logo,ei.e_size,eh.enterprise_id,sum(eh.ehr_currentaccount) as ehr_currentaccount FROM enterprise_info ei LEFT JOIN enterprise_hr eh on ei.e_id=eh.enterprise_id where e_name like CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{key}),'%') GROUP BY ei.e_id ORDER BY ehr_currentaccount
